text: Hu'neanagi mago'amo'za antahi'za zami'mo'a hampo'na atige'za, zamentinti hu'zankura zamagena hunente'za, ana vahe'mokizmi zamufi Ramofo avariri kankura huhaviza hunentageno, zamagrira nezamatreno, Jisasi amage' nentaza disaipol naga nezamavareno, mago nera Tairanusi'e nehaza ne'mofo rempi huzami nonte via'zamo, mika zupa vahe'ene keaga hu'ne.
